title: How to remove soap from the soap water - Quora

response.answer_text: Add calcium hydroxide and boil the solution. Let the solution cool down you ‘ll see some precipitates. Filter out these precipitates, these precipitates would be calcium salt of fatty acid which were part of your soap. Now these filtered precipitates can be converted back to Soap, by addition of lye and evaporation of water. Above mentioned process needs optimization basis the scale of operation.

Pour some acid to the soap water. The soap will hydrolyse to fatty acid which can be decanted and removed. The fillers in soap can be removed by filtration and when distilling the water, the salts will be left behind and you will get water as distillate.
